title: Age of Empires: Definitive Edition
description:
Age of Empires, the pivotal RTS that launched a 20-year legacy returns in definitive form for Windows 10 PCs. Bringing together all of the officially released content with modernized gameplay, all-new visuals and a host of other new features , Age of Empires: Definitive Edition is the complete RTS package.
Engage in over 40 hours of updated campaign content with new narration and pacing, jump online in up to 8-player battles with new competitive features and modes, experience 4K HD visuals with overhauled animations, get creative with the scenario builder and share your creations. Thereâ€™s never been a better time to jump in to Age of Empires. Welcome back to history. Far Cry 6

system_requirements.Processor: 2.4 Ghz i5 or greater (4 HW threads)
